mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (join_class_id, comment, star) VALUES (#{joinClassId}, #{comment}, #{star});
mapper.select: SELECT r.join_class_id AS joinClassId, u.user_id AS userId, u.nick_name AS writerName, u.user_pic AS writerPic, r.comment AS comment, r.star AS star, r.created_at AS createdAt FROM review r JOIN joinclass j ON r.join_class_id = j.join_class_id JOIN class c ON j.class_id = c.class_id JOIN user u ON j.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.aca_id = #{acaId} ORDER BY r.created_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size}
